item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: What our Wedding Couples say
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_single_quote author="Maria & Jason" company="" title="Thank You Brooklyn Weddings for making our day perfect!" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="false" effect="fadeIn"] Thank you for making our day perfect. From talking to our planner online to make our reservation, to meeting us and going over everything, we knew we were in good hands. Our day was perfect and fun. Thank you again!!! [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Diana & Steven" company="" title="Fantastic experience by well organised professionals!" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="true" effect="fadeIn"] Renewal of vows for our 10th Anniversary was perfectly planned and executed. From the pick up in limo to the ceremony photos and drop off in the limo. The gazebo on the terrace was magical and the staff made us all feel special, especially the words from the Minister... They were perfect for how we feel about each other. [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Chrissi & Matthias" company="" title="Just Amazing!!!" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="false" effect="fadeIn"] I recently got married here in may 2016. After planning it all over the internet with shannon the wedding planner prior !! Everything on the day went perfect !! The staff were friendly and made our day go smoothly !! Highly recommended to anyone getting married in New York!! Photos also came out perfect ! So happy [/ut_single_quote]
[ut_single_quote author="Jacqueline & Marcel" company="" title="Fabulous Terrace wedding venue!" avatar="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/member.jpg" date="" margin_bottom="20" rating="five" width="half" last="true" effect="fadeIn"] I cannot thank this venue enough! The whole process, from booking online, through to arrival, the wedding and the photo viewing was efficient. I loved the terrace and getting married outside holding a beautiful small bouquet of flowers they provided. The minister was excellent and we have some love photographs too, including one in a folder with the wedding certificate. Long Island will be forever special in my hear. [/ut_single_quote]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Brooklyn Weddings offer a range of wedding packages to suit your every need. From all inclusive packages providing everything you need for your special day to a Vintage Afternoon Tea theme.

item.title: Our Wedding Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_46.png" headline="Photos" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Capture your Brooklyn wedding with award-winning photography.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_12.png" headline="Flowers" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Our on-site Floral Studio will design the wedding flowers of your dreams. [/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_09.png" headline="Cermony" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] Customize your Brooklyn wedding ceremony to include specialty services.[/ut_service_column][ut_clear]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_10.png" headline="Attire" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Say "I do" in style with our fashion-forward wedding attire packages.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_22.png" headline="Reception" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Celebrate your Brooklyn wedding with a casual or elegant wedding reception.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_28.png" headline="Hotel" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] Find and book your Brooklyn hotel for you and your guests.[/ut_service_column][ut_clear]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_47.png" headline="Video" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Broadcast your wedding ceremony and relive all the moments from your wedding.[/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_17.png" headline="Wedding Cakes" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="false"] Be married and eat cake! Fun and elegant wedding cakes available in all sizes. [/ut_service_column]
[ut_service_column color="#FDA527" icon="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo16/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/wedding_52.png" headline="Limousines" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="third" effect="fadeInUp" last="true"] Arrive in comfort, elegance, and style to the Brooklyn wedding of your dreams. [/ut_service_column]

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
